aboutHomePage.title: Meet our team:
aboutHomePage.firstParagraph: We are a team passionate about technology and innovation, made up of professionals in many areas.
aboutHomePage.secondParagraph: We focus on fluid and adaptable behavior, transcending borders, maintaining a close relationship with our clients to achieve a perfect synergy, in which the process is enjoyed and the result is obtained above those affected.

servicesName.title: We support you with developments in severals areas

servicesHomePage.proyectsDescription: We carry out the planning, management and execution of your project.
servicesHomePage.electronicDescription: We design intelligent systems at any scale.
servicesHomePage.webDescription: Applications that provide user experiences in innovative environments
servicesHomePage.movilDescription: Your company on mobile devices with the latest tools.

testimoniosPage.title: Look what those who already know us say

contactHomePage.title: Our expert team
contactHomePage.research: Carry out the study and plan the development
contactHomePage.together: We accompany you in the implementation

heroAboutPage.firstDescription: Our main focus is to develop projects and positively impact each project we are part of, maintaining a high level of commitment to achieve the objectives set.
heroAboutPage.secondDescription: We practice the constant exchange of ideas in a global environment, which allows us to remain at the forefront of current trends.

valoresAboutPage.empathyDescription: We create an environment of trust, we connect with you to understand your business and needs.
valoresAboutPage.passionDescription: We believe that the success of a project lies in believing in it and betting fully to make it happen.
valoresAboutPage.focusDescription: We maintain clear objectives and fully directed efforts to achieve them successfully.
valoresAboutPage.teamDesciption: We adapt to effective communications that facilitate cooperative processes and advances.

heroServicesPage.firstDescription: In Orbittas we develop projects that involve different areas of technology, understanding that their integration is the force of the future.
heroServicesPage.secondDescription: Our diversity and flexibility empowers us to obtain rapid and agile response capacity to current demands.
